description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
number of experiment from publication
name of the participant -
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
role of the participant – focal_participant
name of the participant_2
age presented in years of participant_2 – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant_2
role of the participant_2 – partner
name of the participant_3
age presented in years of participant_3 – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant_3
role of the participant_3 – third_party
name of the three ape participants that compose the triad
species of individuals participating in the study - chimpanzee
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical

dr = direct reciprocity condition. The partner released food that was directly going to the focal_participant. The third party chimp did not do anything. ir = indirect reciprocity condition. The partner released food that was going to the third party chimp. The focal_participant received an unrelated piece of food.

location of the prosocial (1/1) option for the focal_participant. This could either have been location 1 = the two cups to the left from focal_participant POV or 2 = the two cups to the right from focal_participant POV.
option the focal_participant chose

0 = focal_participant did not choose prosocially (prosocial_option and focal_participant_choice are not the same)- 1 = focal_participant chose prosocially (prosocial_option and focal_participant_choice are identical).
